features: NO MARKS ON 100 COLORS: Dove Advanced Care Invisible Clear Finish Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick is proven to leave no white marks on 100 colors of clothing
EFFECTIVE PROTECTION AND KIND TO SKIN: Our deodorant for women keeps your underarms dry and odor-free for up to 48 hours while being kind to your skin
SOFT AND COMFORTABLE UNDERARMS: Our antiperspirant deodorant for women, containing 1/4 moisturizers with natural oil, cares for your underarm skin
ALCOHOL-FREE FORMULA: The 0% alcohol (ethanol) formula of our antiperspirant stick helps skin recover from underarm irritation that shaving can cause
KEEPS YOU FRESH: Try this antiperspirant for women with sparkling zesty top notes of pears and pineapple wrapped into a petally bouquet of freesia, waterlily and rose
CERTIFIED CRUELTY-FREE ANTIPERSPIRANT: Globally, Dove does not test on animals and is certified cruelty-free by PETA
body.description: Step out in style with Dove Advanced Care Invisible Clear Finish Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick. This antiperspirant deodorant for women is proven not to leave white marks on 100 colors of clothing. This non-irritating antiperspirant for women will leave your underarms feeling healthy and protected for up to 48 hours as it gives you long-lasting protection against underarm sweat and odor. Enriched with our signature 1/4 moisturizers with natural oil, this antiperspirant’s 0% alcohol (ethanol) formula helps reduce irritation from shaving and leaves you with the fresh scent of pear and pineapple with notes of freesia, waterlily and rose. Use Dove women's deodorant regularly and you can enjoy beautifully soft and comfortable underarms that stay dry all day long. For best results, swipe your antiperspirant deodorant stick up and down each underarm until an even layer is applied. Apply this Dove antiperspirant deodorant to dry skin after showering and enjoy fresh, comfortably dry skin from morning to night. Dove is certified cruelty-free by PETA because we believe that real beauty is cruelty-free. We’re on a mission to help women raise their self-esteem – because we believe beauty should be a source of confidence, not anxiety. Dove Antiperspirant Deodorants deliver effective underarm protection and are kind to skin, so women can be free of underarm inhibitions and live beautifully unselfconsciously.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 72h odor and all day wetness protection Dove knows that underarm skin needs kindness as well as protection. That’s why Dove Advanced Care gives you 72h odor and all day wetness protection, while also containing caring ingredients making it kind to your skin. Replenish your skin after every shave 1/3 of what you remove when you shave is skin. Dove Advanced Care with pro-ceramide technology replenishes you skin after every shave. For soft, resilient skin. Dove Invisible Clear Finish Deodorant is vegan Our Invisible Clear Finish is vegan and Dove is PETA approved, meaning we do not test on animals, anywhere in the world. Punchy pineapple Juicy pineapple, crisp pear and delicate rose combine in a fresh scent with a tropical twist.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had a lot of issues with a different deodorants so I tried this one out and my underarms feel great. No residue, smells nice all day and no reactions to my skin. It's simple but it's just what I need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dove is gentle on your skin & it works
reviews.reviewText: I like Dove deodorants and have used their deodorant and the anti-perspirant but am sticking with their deodorant because it’s gentle on your skin and, of course, aluminum free. It works very well for me and keeps me smelling fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This deodorant is absolutely perfect!! It applies smoothly and feels great. The scent is truly coconut and I love it. Dove has always been my favorite and it outshines any other brand I've tried over the decades. I'm so glad it comes in a 2 pack so I can stash it and always have it on hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as promised!
reviews.reviewText: I was very skeptical about using this product but my doctor actually talked me into trying it. I've been having issues with underarm itch from my last deodorant and switching to Dove deodorant was suggested as it is supposed to be useful for sensitive skin. I was skeptical because I work out a lot and figured this deodorant wouldn't be up to the test but I was WRONG! This works great to control wetness and odor. The scent could be toned down a little for my tastes but it isn't overpowering. I haven't had any issues with white marks on dark clothing but I haven't really paid attention to it. I do LOVE the fact that it glides on smooth and it doesn't leave those bunched up white balls of deodorant under your arms like some of the other solids.Overall this is a great product and worth the price! For every woman wondering if it is worth the money - it is! I used to use Secret deodorant until they changed the formula or something and it quit working for me. So after trying several other deodorants, I went to Sure. But now it makes my skin itch - might be hormonal changes, not necessarily the deodorant's fault.This is now my new deodorant. Great stuff and worth trying!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars AWESOME protection with a mild scent!
reviews.reviewText: Dove Advanced Care Antiperspirant is definitely awesome. In the hot summer months here in NC, I need something that offers both superior wetness AND odor control. Some deodorant products leave my underarms itchy and irritated, especially when I sweat. Others smell great when applied but after a long workout or several hours working in the yard, that scent quickly wears off, leaving me smelling less than fresh. :)I love the creamy texture of this product. It glides across my skin easily and leaves my underarms feeling moisturized and protected without feeling coated, sticky, or slimy.The fragrance is a little more subtle than I would have preferred but it still smells very fresh & clean, maybe even a little powdery. (not a fan of powdery scents normally) I would have preferred the scent to be a little stronger but that is just my personal preference.I shower daily so I can't say for sure that the protection lasts 48 hours. However, I can say that it lasts the entire day until I DO shower. My underarms are never sticky, wet, or smelly AND the product doesn't rub off on my clothes leaving those dreaded white marks!Through the Chatterbox by House Party program, I received a free Dove Advanced Care Antiperspirant to try and give my opinions on. All opinions expressed here are my own and not influenced by the company in any way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like the fact it goes on smooth and lasts even under stress!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really like this
reviews.reviewText: Smells good and love that it doesn’t leave a thick icky feeling

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked for me when all others failed.
reviews.reviewText: My usual deodorant stopped working a couple years ago. I won't name names, but it starts with a D and ends with -egree. :P I tried a bunch of "clinical-strength" and natural deodorants/antiperspirants, but none worked, except Native, but it also made my underarms burn and itch from dry-ness, so that wasn't cool either. Then I tried this one, and BINGO! I've been using it ever since and it's worked perfectly, even when I'm sweating my butt off outside in a tank-top for hours. The coconut scent is my favorite, but I think I've tried them all, and I haven't found one I didn't like. I've heard rave reviews from friends about this deodorant too, so I don't think it's just me. If you're on the fence, try it!!
